content: Home Page: Isambo Karali KARALI Isambo Address: Department of Informatics and Telecommunications National and Kapodistrian University of Athens Panepistimiopolis, 157 84 Athens, Greece E-mail address: izambodi.uoa.gr Phone: +(30) 210 727 5232 Education 1995	PhD in Informatics (Department of Informatics, University of Athens) 1988 	Msc in Computer Science (University College, University of London) 1986	Diploma in Mathematics (Department of Mathematics, University of Athens) Professional Appointments Nov. 2007 - today: Assistant Professor at the Department of Informatics and Telecommunications of the University of Athens Sept. 1999 - Nov. 2007: Lecturer at the Department of Informatics and Telecommunications of the University of Athens Jan. 1989 - Sept. 1999: Research associate at the Department of Informatics of the University of Athens in the context of European Union research projects May 1996 - June 1998: Postdoctoral researcher collaborating with the Institute of Informatics and Telecommunications of NCSR"Democritos" In the context of a GSRT PENED project Research Interests Teaching Activities Diploma/Postgraduate/PhD Theses Supervision Research Projects - International Agreements Other Professional Activities Publications Research Interests Knowledge Representation / Reasoning under Uncertainty Artificial Intelligence Logic Programming Object-oriented Programming and Object-oriented Knowledge Representation Modularity Abstract Data Types Semantic Web Information Representation/Extraction Web Information Extraction Intelligent Agents/ Multi-agent Systems Deductive Databases Teaching Activities Current: Object Oriented Programming (undergraduate) (course web page -in Greek-) Introduction to Artificial Intelligence: Knowledge Represenation (postgraduate - Graduate Studies in Applied Cognitive Science) / Knowledge Technologies (postgraduate - Graduate Studies in Language Technology) (course web page -in Greek-) Logic Programming (undergraduate - with P. Stamatopoulos) ( course web page -in Greek-) Past: Knowledge Technology (postgraduate - Erasmus Mundus Joint Master degrees programme "Smart Telecom and Sensing Networks" - SMARTNET) Knowledge Engineering (postgraduate - Graduate Studies in Basic and Applied Cognitive Science) Knowledge Engineering (postgraduate) Introduction to Informatics for the School of Social Theology (undergraduate) / Introduction to Informatics for the School of Theology (undergraduate) Applied Informatics for the School of Social Theology (undergraduate) / Applied Informatics for the School of Theology (undergraduate) Object-oriented Software Development (undergraduate) Logic Programming and Expert Systems (undergraduate) Artificial Intelligence (undergraduate) Systems Analysis (undergraduate) Expert Systems (postgraduate) Artificial Intelligence (postgraduate) Databases (postgraduate) In addition, she has given course lectures in other departments and institutions such as Faculty of Communication and Media Studies, National and Kapodistrian University of Athens The Medical Informatics MSc ERASMUS programme, National and Kapodistrian University of Athens School of Electrical and Computer Engineering, National Technical University of Athens Diploma/Postgraduate/PhD Theses Supervision Area of interest: Knowledge Representation and Reasoning under Uncertainty. Logic Programming to represent and reason under uncertainty, especially in distributed environments.
